about_the_game:
In “Haven Fore Emma” you are immersed in a story full of drama and human relationships. You play as a young man who is faced with an unexpected offer from his coworker, Emma. After being fired and unable to pay the rent, Emma comes to you for help and offers you something unusual in return for your hospitality. You can do whatever you want with her. You can fuck this girl 24 hours a day or just live with her as a loyal friend. But what kind of challenges this sexy girl has in store for you? This you will find out in this game!

The game is intended for an adult audience and contains themes that may not be suitable for all ages or for viewing at work.

Deep story: Explore complex moral dilemmas and make decisions that will have serious consequences for both characters.
Interactive Interaction: Interact with Emma to deepen your understanding of her character and your relationship.
Dynamic Character Development: Watch Emma's behavior and emotions change depending on your actions and decisions.
Realistic graphics and atmosphere: Enjoy visually appealing graphics and an atmosphere that immerses you in the world of the game.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and contains sexually explicit material that some viewers may find offensive. The game contains sexual violence, sexual relations without consent, bondage, BDSM and rape. All characters shown in the game are over 18 years old.

name: Haven For Emma

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (only 64-bit) or Windows 10 (only 64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz (2 Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 260 / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (only 64-bit) or Windows 10 (only 64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.33 Ghz (4 Core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 670 / AMD Radeon HD 7990
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: Haven For Emma is a first-person game. You find yourself in the role of a young guy who has received an unusual offer from his girlfriend Emma. Emma will live in your house and you will do whatever you want with her! It's up to you whether you fuck her or not.....
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
